meanings.definition: Not aware of or not concerned about what is happening around oneself.
meanings.sent1: The child was oblivious to the noise outside.
meanings.sent2: She walked down the street, oblivious to the people passing by.
meanings.sent3: He was so oblivious to the surprise party that he walked right past the decorated door.
meanings.sent4: The cat lounged in the sun, oblivious to the birds chirping nearby.
meanings.sent5: The student was oblivious to the due date of the assignment, resulting in a late submission.
